name: 9ac345a5509a.github.io
body:
# Introduction

I program mainly in C and Javascript, although I usually only publish Javascript demos. I enjoy Cryptography and Statistics (basically Math âˆ© Programming).

## Why "9ac345a5509a"?

Python:

    import hashlib
    hashlib.sha384(name).hexdigest()[-12:] == '9ac345a5509a'

Bash:

    printf "$NAME" | sha384sum 

## Completed / Active Projects

### P2P-Paillier

A little weekend project of mine which allows a peer to add two numbers over a peer-to-peer network. Peers add these two numbers without even knowing what they are. It uses Firebase (which is centralized) in order to push commands to the peers.

* [Demo](http://9ac345a5509a.github.io/p2p-paillier/)
* [Github Code](http://github.com/9ac345a5509a/p2p-paillier/)
* [HN Discussion](http://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=6159835)

## Work In Progress

### STS.js

A port of NIST's Statistical Test Suite for Random Number Generators to Javascript. I eventually plan to have this be a little demo for testing browsers random number generators along with the analysis of failed random number generators (RANDU, Cryptocat July 2013).

* [Github Code](http://github.com/9ac345a5509a/sts.js/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
